item.description:
Dale, Susan K and Alice are hosting an event at Johnny D's.


Sunday, January 16th at 11:00 AM there is a Jazz Brunch @ Johnny D's where Dale, Alice and Susan K will be the event hosts.

Johnny D's is located across the street from the Davis Square T Station in Somerville [Red Line]. South Shore people can either car pool to the Red Line together or drive in. For those who live near the Green Line, you can transfer at Park Street Station to the Red Line heading towards Alewife and get off at Davis Square. On Sundays you don't need to put money in the parking meters. The atmosphere at Johnny D's Brunch is usually casual and relaxed. You can each order whatever you want off of the menu. There are vegetarian options. Link to their website:

www.johnnyds.com
item.name: Jazz Brunch @ Johnny D's in Davis Square
